sens.mc: a statement of what to do that must be obeyed by those concerned
sens.vi: a starchily worded dictate from on high concerning the company's dress code
sens.syn: behest, charge, commandment, decree, dictate, direction, directive, do, edict, imperative, injunction, instruction, order, word
sens.rel: demand, requirement; mandate; countermand, counterorder; law, precept, prescript, prescription, rule; ordinance, regulation, statute
sens.near: appeal, entreaty, petition, plea, urging; proposal, recommendation, suggestion

sens.mc: to request the doing of by virtue of one's authority
sens.vi: dictated that the terms of surrender be negotiated by his senior staff
sens.syn: call, decree, dictate, direct, mandate, ordain, order
